ecommerceProductGridDescription: For compactly displaying products in a grid layout.
ecommerceProductListDescription: For displaying products in a list view, providing more space for information.
ecommerceCartItemDescription: Represents a single item in the shopping cart, with quantity controls.
ecommerceOrderSummaryDescription: Summarizes cart totals and leads to checkout.
ecommercePromotionDescription: Highlights special offers with a countdown and eye-catching design.
productDescription: Next-gen wearable with integrated AI assistant and holographic display.
promoSubtitle: Up to 50% off on select tech gadgets
ecommerceCategoryDescription: Visually appealing cards to guide users to product categories.
ecommerceReviewDescription: Display user feedback and ratings to build trust.
ecommerceShippingDescription: Allow users to select their preferred shipping method.
reviewContent: This smart watch exceeded my expectations! The battery life is amazing and the screen is so crisp. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a high-end wearable.
